metadata.title: CVE-2021-3480 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS-updates 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: A flaw was found in slapi-nis in versions before 0.56.7. A NULL pointerdereference during the parsing of the Binding DN could allow anunauthenticated attacker to crash the 389-ds-base directory server. Thehighest threat from this vulnerability is to system availability.

criterions.comment: slapi-nis package in bionic is affected and may need fixing.
